text:
Wow, look...!
It's a white-eye bird!

Oh, let me see...
Did it fly away?

Mano really loves birds, huh!
Hey, Producer, do you have a favorite animal?

Yeah, they're great! Fluffy dogs
look so comfortable when you pet them...!

Haha, true. There's someone around
here who often walks a big dog...

Wow, really...?
Can I ask which bird you like?

Both of you really like birds...!
I'd love Mano to teach me about them!

There's one I often see around the neighborhood.
It's very friendly, so it catches my attention.

Oh, is it the blackish one by any chance...?
I've seen it a few times too...!
